```{r, label = 'DEPENDENCIES'}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, label ='READ IN DATA SET'}
mpg_data <- read.csv("MechaCar_mpg.csv", check.names = F, stringsAsFactors = F)
```

```{r, label = 'LINEAR REGRESSION'}
lm(mpg ~ vehicle_length + vehicle_weight + spoiler_angle + ground_clearance + AWD, mpg_data)
summary(lm(mpg ~ vehicle_length + vehicle_weight + spoiler_angle + ground_clearance + AWD, mpg_data))
```

```{r}
lm(mpg~vehicle_weight,mpg_data)
summary(lm(mpg~vehicle_weight,mpg_data))
mpg_weight <- lm(mpg ~ vehicle_weight, mpg_data)

yvals <- mpg_weight$coefficients['vehicle_weight']*mpg_data$vehicle_weight + mpg_weight$coefficients['(Intercept)']

ggplot(mpg_data, aes(x=vehicle_weight, y=mpg)) + geom_point() + geom_line(aes(y=yvals), color = "red",)

```
